name: Rummy - Offline
description:
Rummy offline (the board game version of its card counterpart) is now ready for android mobile phones and tablets with its high quality. Download now and play free. You can play Rummy - Offline anywhere you want. There is no need for an internet connection. You can earn millions of chips and play in high-bet rooms against artificial intelligence if you are a really good rummy player.

Rummy offline is a tile-based game for four players, combining elements of the card game rummy, rummy 500, Indian Rummy, board game okey and mahjong. It is also a puzzle game like klondike, solitaire, spider and free cell solitaire. In some parts of the world, our game is known as rummicub or rummykub.
